analysis.key_quote: By removing appeal rights and other due process protections from a potentially sizeable segment of federal jobs, those hard-working, high-performing individuals who were willing to trade high-salary private sector jobs for the stability of government service will undoubtedly look elsewhere for work.
analysis.rationale: The comment explicitly opposes the proposed rule by highlighting concerns about the removal of due process protections and the negative impact on merit-based hiring and retention of high-performing employees, indicating a strong alignment with the themes of accountability and civil service integrity.
